death.attack.dmnr_force.player: %s was crushed by the sheer force of %s
dmnr.commands.output.writeSpellToArmor.n: You must be wearing full set of Dragon Mage Armor for the command to work.
You have no valid spell in your main hand.
dmnr.commands.output.changeDragonMageArm: This command requires the target to wear full Dragon Mage Armor
dmnr.commands.output.callApplyUpgrade.no: The item in your main-hand cannot contain Dragon Magic
dmnr.commands.output.callApplyUpgrade.fa: The container does not have enough space to install the upgrade!
dmnr.ring_of_spell_storing.no_ring.error: You need a §eBracelet of Spell Storing§r to use this key.
This item does not support channeled spells. Only instant spells can be used.
dmnr.shapes.atmark.nomark.error: I need a Rune of Marking in my other hand or need to set a player mark with a Mark-Spell to use this spell.
dmnr.shapes.curse.no_charm.error: I need a Player Charm in my other hand to use this spell.
dmnr.shapes.curse.no_target.error: The selected Player does not exist.
dmnr.shapes.curse.too_far.error: The selected Player is to far away.
dmnr.shapes.curse.protection.error: The selected Player protects itself against your Magic.
dmnr.shapes.friends.no_bracelet_of_frien: I need a Bracelet of Friendship to use this spell
dmnr.ritual.output.upgrade.ritual.alread: The upgrade is already at maximum strength.
dmnr.ritual.output.upgrade.ritual.unexpe: You don't have enough Dragon Magic Points left to install this upgrade.
dmnr.ritual.output.upgrade.ritual.no_dm_: You need to have a Dragon Magic Container in your offhand.
dmnr.ritual.output.dragonmagearmorritual: You must be wearing a full set of faction armor to perform this ritual.
You must be level 75 in order to perform this ritual.
dmnr.ritual.output.secondchanceritual.mi: There's no place I could go back to.
dmnr.feedback.weather.not_changable: There is no weather in this region!
tooltip.dmnr.ring_of_power.tooltip.one: One Ring to surpass them all!
tooltip.dmnr.ring_of_power.tooltip.two: One Ring that increases each of its upgrades by 1!
tooltip.dmnr.ring_of_ruling.tooltip.one: One Ring to rule them all!
tooltip.dmnr.ring_of_ruling.tooltip.two: One Ring to use upgrades without a Dragon Magic Armor!
tooltip.dmnr.upgradeseal.stronger_versio: The upgrade also exists in a stronger version:
tooltip.dmnr.upgradeseal.not_supports_ex: The upgrade is not compatible with the Ring of Power
tooltip.dmnr.armor.tooltip.upgrade.base: You have installed the following upgrades:
dmnr:armorupgrade/explosion_resistance.d: Makes the wearer immune to explosions.
dmnr:armorupgrade/reach_distance.descrip: Increases the interaction range of the wearer.
dmnr:armorupgrade/elytra.description: Allows the wearer to use the Elytra.
dmnr:armorupgrade/angel_flight.descripti: Allows the wearer to fly like an angel.
dmnr:armorupgrade/meteor_jump.descriptio: Allows the wearer to fall like a meteor.
Reflects one projectile that would hit the wielder.
dmnr:armorupgrade/burning_frenzy.descrip: Allows the wearer to run extremely fast and walking on lava.
Protects the wearer from all fire and lets them see trough lava.
Protects the wearer from burns by consuming its mana.
dmnr:armorupgrade/movement_speed.descrip: Allows the player to run significantly faster.
dmnr:armorupgrade/damage_boost.descripti: Increases the damage done by the user.
dmnr:armorupgrade/jump.description: Allows the user to jump higher and run larger steps.
dmnr:armorupgrade/regeneration.descripti: Permanently regenerates some HP of the user.
dmnr:armorupgrade/damage_resistance.desc: Protects the wearer from a percentage of the damage.
dmnr:armorupgrade/kinetic_resistance.des: Protects the wearer from all kinetic damage
dmnr:armorupgrade/mist_form.description: If the wearer would die, it briefly wanders the world as an incorporeal entity.
dmnr:armorupgrade/water_breathing.descri: Allows the user to breathe underwater
dmnr:armorupgrade/night_vision.descripti: Allows the user to see through the darkness if needed
dmnr:armorupgrade/dolphins_grace.descrip: Allows the player to swim significantly faster.
dmnr:armorupgrade/mana_boost.description: Increases the user's maximum mana storage.
dmnr:armorupgrade/major_mana_boost.descr: Increases the user's maximum mana storage.
dmnr:armorupgrade/sorcerers_pride.descri:
Increases castet Spells Attributes:
- Magnitude +0.5
- Damage +3
- Duration: +30%
dmnr:armorupgrade/insight.description: Makes you see damage and healing numbers.
dmnr:armorupgrade/mana_regen.description: Increases the rate at which the user's mana regenerates.
dmnr:shapes/friends.desc.range: The Radius in which my friends will be affected
dmnr:shapes/atmark.desc.radius: The radius of the mark's impact.
dmnr:shapes/atmark.desc.range: The maximum distance that the spell can be casted. Each point raises the cap by 500 blocks.
dmnr:shapes/curse.desc.range: Times 20 = The maximum distance that the target can be.
dmnr:shapes/true_touch.desc.radius: Applies a radius to the touch. When targeting blocks on the side, this center will be shifted so it only goes down one block, the rest will go up, allowing easy tunnels.
dmnr:components/sunrise.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/moonrise.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/banishrain.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/conjurestorm.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/conjurestorm.desc.magnit: Turns the rain into a storm.
dmnr:components/ultimatearmor.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/ultimatearmor.desc.durat: The duration of the ultimate armor.
dmnr:components/conjurewater.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/conjurewater.desc.magnit: Defies the hellish heat (can be deactivated via Config!)
dmnr:components/conjurelava.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/saturate.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/saturate.desc.magnitude: Number of hunger bars (and saturation) that are filled.
dmnr:components/mark.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/forcedamage.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/forcedamage.desc.damage: The damage dealt to affected targets.
dmnr:components/forcedamage.desc.magnitu: Decreases the factor that the armor absorbs, to a point that an opponent with stronger armor takes more damage.
dmnr:components/alternativerecall.desc.d: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
dmnr:components/alternativerecall.desc.r: The maximum distance that can be recalled. Each point raises the cap by 1.000 blocks. At Max Level, the range is unlimited.
dmnr:components/alternativerecall.desc.p: If 1, the caster teleports to the spell location.
dmnr:components/alternativerecall.desc.m: How strong the target of the spell can be. 1 point = 20 HP.
